Title: Spotify
Desc: A Spotify clone created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is a web-based music streaming interface. It has features like a responsive UI, audio playback, playlist management using JavaScript.

Title: Todo
Desc: A fullstack TODO app using React, Node.js, Express, and SQL lets users manage tasks with a dynamic frontend and a RESTful backend. It demonstrates CRUD operations with persistent data storage

Title: POST App
Desc: Built a secure backend for a post management app with full CRUD functionality using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Implemented user authentication and authorization
